ValidationRule.description: FS Fee must be rounded to whole dollar.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Received"), (Opportunity__r.Account.ShippingState = 'Idaho'),
AND(OR( FS_Fees__c <> ROUND( FS_Fees__c , 0 )),
NOT(OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='HB_Open', RecordType.DeveloperName ='H_B_Received' ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please round FS Fee for Idaho
